name: 2025 The 8th International Conference on Artificial Intelligence and Big Data
content: Publication: Accepted papers will be submitted for publication into IEEE conference proceedings, included in Digital Xplore and indexed by EI Compendex and Scopus, etc. ICAIBD 2018-2023 has been successfully indexed by EI Compendex and Scopus already within 3-4 months after the conference.
